narrative.title: 44Th Infantry Division - 1943Q1
narrative.situation: British infantry_division deployed in North Africa during 1943Q1.
narrative.objectives: Division withdrawn from combat and disbanded 31 January 1943. Final operational period November 1942 - January 1943 pursuing Axis forces after El Alamein.
narrative.axis_objective: Hold current positions and prevent Allied breakthrough.
narrative.allied_objective: Advance and neutralize Axis defensive positions.

weather.terrain: Libyan/Tunisian border area - coastal plain and rocky desert. Division withdrawn from combat operations.

air_support.note: No theater air summary available for this quarter

special_rules: Combat-proven division after El Alamein battle
Territorial Army units with strong regional cohesion (Home Counties)
Desert warfare experience gained through El Alamein and pursuit

environment.terrain_type: Libyan/Tunisian border area - coastal plain and rocky desert. Division withdrawn from combat operations.
